results.description: Borussia Dortmund miss the chance to climb to second in the Bundesliga after being held by Werder Bremen.
results.shortTitle: Dortmund held at home by Bremen
results.title: Borussia Dortmund 2-2 Werder Bremen: Hosts miss chance to move second in Bundesliga

results.description: Bayern Munich will face RB Leipzig in the German Cup final after Robert Lewandowski's double helps them to a 3-2 win over Werder Bremen.
results.shortTitle: Bayern face Leipzig in German Cup final
results.title: Bayern Munich to face Leipzig in German Cup final

results.description: Bayern Munich move four points clear at the top of the Bundesliga with victory over 10-man Werder Bremen.
results.shortTitle: Bayern extend lead at top to four points
results.title: Bayern Munich 1-0 Werder Bremen: Champions go four points clear at top

results.description: Schalke warm up for Tuesday's Champions League second leg with Manchester City by conceding at least three goals for a fourth game in a row.
results.shortTitle: Man City opponents Schalke lose again
results.title: Werder Bremen 4-2 Schalke: Man City's opponents struggles continue

results.description: Borussia Dortmund concede in the last minute of extra time and then lose on penalties to Werder Bremen in the DFB Pokal
results.shortTitle: Dortmund lose cup thriller on penalties
results.title: Borussia Dortmund lose cup thriller on penalties as Werder Bremen win

results.description: The use of a drone during Hoffenheim's final training session before a Bundesliga game is being investigated by German police.
results.title: Hoffenheim: German police investigate drone use during training

thumbnail.altText: A drone flying in the air

results.description: Claudio Pizarro becomes only the second 40-year-old to score a Bundesliga goal - but his Werder Bremen side are thrashed by Bayer Leverkusen.
results.shortTitle: Pizarro scores for 19th year in row
results.title: Werder Bremen 2-6 Bayer Leverkusen: Claudio Pizarro scores for 19th year in row

results.description: Stuttgart goalkeeper Ron-Robert Zieler concedes an embarrassing own goal during their 2-1 win over Werder Bremen, misjudging a throw-in from defender Borna Sosa.
results.shortTitle: Stuttgart's comedy own goal from throw-in
results.title: Bundesliga: Stuttgart concede comedy own goal from throw-in

results.description: Holders Eintracht Frankfurt suffer a shock defeat at fourth-tier Ulm in the first round of the German Cup, as Bayern Munich progress.
results.shortTitle: Holders Frankfurt suffer shock German Cup loss
results.title: German Cup: Holders Frankfurt suffer shock loss but Bayern Munich through

results.description: Netherlands international midfielder Davy Klaassen completes his move from Everton to Werder Bremen for a reported 12m.
results.title: Davy Klaassen: Everton midfielder joins Werder Bremen

results.description: Bibiana Steinhaus becomes the Bundesliga's first female referee, taking charge of Hertha Berlin's draw against Werder Bremen.
results.title: Hertha BSC 1-1 Werder Bremen

results.description: Robert Lewandowski scores twice in the last 20 minutes as Bayern Munich beat Werder Bremen in the Bundesliga.
results.title: Werder Bremen 0-2 Bayern Munich

results.description: Former Arsenal winger Serge Gnabry joins German champions Bayern Munich from Werder Bremen on a three-year deal.
results.title: Serge Gnabry: Former Arsenal winger joins Bayern Munich from Werder Bremen

results.description: RB Leipzig lose ground on Bundesliga leaders Bayern Munich with a costly defeat at Werder Bremen.
results.title: Werder Bremen 3-0 RB Leipzig

results.description: Bayern Munich remain three points clear at the top of the Bundesliga after beating Werder Bremen 2-1.
results.title: Werder Bremen 1-2 Bayern Munich

results.description: ai tsaron baya na Arsenal, Per Mertesacker, ya saka hannu kan yarjejeniyar ci gaba da wasa a Gunners zuwa shekara daya.
results.title: Arsenal ta tsawaita zaman Mertesacker a kungiyar

results.description: Having played in goal for Germany and Werder Bremen, Tim Wiese turned his back on football and has become a professional WWE wrestler.
results.shortTitle: From Bundesliga goalkeeper to WWE star
results.title: Tim Wiese: From Bundesliga goalkeeper to WWE star

results.description: Live text commentary of Carlo Ancelotti's first league game in charge as Bayern Munich hammer Werder Bremen 6-0 in the first Bundesliga game of 2016/17.
results.title: Bayern Munich 6-0 Werder Bremen
